// Pivot 0, 0
int FlipperR[22] = {
	42, 2,
	49, 4,
	51, 9,
	51, 15,
	48, 20,
	42, 21,
	5, 17,
	2, 14,
	2, 9,
	6, 6,
	33, 3
};

// Pivot 0.000000, 0.000000
float FlipperR[22] = {
	0.777778f, 0.083333f,
	0.907407f, 0.166667f,
	0.944444f, 0.375000f,
	0.944444f, 0.625000f,
	0.888889f, 0.833333f,
	0.777778f, 0.875000f,
	0.092593f, 0.708333f,
	0.037037f, 0.583333f,
	0.037037f, 0.375000f,
	0.111111f, 0.250000f,
	0.611111f, 0.125000f
};
